What you can expect from me: Website development based on client's custom design, with the requested client-side functions, considering the current UI and UX expectations. After completing the tasks, I manage the entire life cycle of the website from deploying to maintenance (agile methodology).
Unfortunately, you can not count on me with: JAVA language. If that is what you need, unfortunately I cannot help you. But I am open to new technologies, like Node.js.
